backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing cards with access control, user profiles, and CRUD for card data including sales and trades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented frontend files to feature IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all major frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity, actor/profile loading with timeouts, retries, and page/tab rendering.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog form for adding cards with free-text fields, autocomplete suggestions, and backend mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Reusable text input with filtered suggestion dropdown and outside-click handling.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a single card with rarity styling, price formatting, and actions for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal that lists crafted cards with rarity badges, metadata, and purchase details pulled from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog for editing a cardâ€™s fields, syncing form state with the selected card and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a reset option with technical details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and authentication controls integrating Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Always-open modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog allowing users to sell a card or record a trade, including forms, rarity styling, and optional new card creation.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: React modal displaying sold and traded cards with profit/loss calculations and expandable trade details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file for Google authentication logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, cards, and mutations using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup with custom light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Cards page with filtering, search, and add-card dialog using user card data from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: React page showing overall portfolio stats, loading multiple query hooks and rendering profit, transactions, and modals for sold and crafted cards.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Utility functions to extract unique card fields and filter suggestion lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, and overall app purpose.
